thread.title: Mystic Martin DuRant
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Mystic Martin DuRant

author: Mystic Martin DuRant
title: Mystic Martin DuRant
text: We just returned from our Honeymoon in Costa Rica!! My husband and I are amazed at the entire vacation planned for us by CR Vacations. I'm so glad we put our trust in them. Our travel agent was absolutely amazing, helpful, friendly and right!! She knew exactly what to plan based on what we wanted to accomplish. I cannot wait to book another vacation and have told everyone I know how perfect and wonderful CRV is. Thank you so much!!! ~The Newlyweds!
